arts.ttl: Toppmöller praises "outstanding" Brown in Heidenheim victory
arts.sum: Dino Toppmöller gave a special mention to youngster Nathaniel Brown in his post-match comments following a massive 4-0 win over Heidenheim on Sunday in the Bundesliga.

arts.ttl: Marmoush scores two and Eintracht Frankfurt wins 4-0 at Heidenheim to close gap on Bayern
arts.sum: Omar Marmoush continued his prolific form with two more goals as second-place Eintracht Frankfurt won 4-0 at Heidenheim on Sunday to move four points behind Bundesliga leader Bayern Munich. In Sunday’s other game, striker Jonathan Burkardt scored first-half goals as Mainz beat Hoffenheim 2-0 to move into seventh place.

arts.ttl: Marmoush masterclass propels Frankfurt to victory over Heidenheim
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt secured a dominant 4-0 victory over Heidenheim, with Omar Marmoush scoring twice in an assured performance from the Eagles. Marmoush celebrates with Nathaniel Brown after opening the scoring for Frankfurt.

arts.ttl: Frankfurt on fire as Heidenheim ship heavy defeat
arts.sum: After the distraction of European action for both teams midweek, Heidenheim welcomed Eintracht Frankfurt to the Voith-Arena for the final act of Bundesliga Matchday 12. The visitors took all three points after a comprehensive 4-0 win.

arts.ttl: Why Barcelona had scouts present at Eintracht Frankfurt vs Midtjylland
arts.sum: La Liga giants Barcelona sent scouts to attend the midweek Europa League meeting between Eintracht Frankfurt, and Midtjylland. That’s according to Diario Sport, citing Tipsbladet, who point towards Omar Marmoush…

arts.ttl: Sunday's Bundesliga predictions including Heidenheim vs. Eintracht Frankfurt
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Heidenheim vs. Eintracht Frankfurt.

arts.ttl: Heidenheim vs. Eintracht Frankfurt preview: Die Adler looking to continue red-hot form
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt will be targeting a seventh consecutive victory in all competitions when they travel to Voith-Arena for Sunday’s Bundesliga clash with Heidenheim.

arts.ttl: Preview: Heidenheim vs. Eintracht Frankfurt - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Heidenheim and Eintracht Frankfurt, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt equal Chelsea's unbeaten European record
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt's 2-1 win over FC Midtjylland in the UEFA Europa League on Thursday was not only their fourth victory in five league phase outings this season, it also meant they equalled a long-standing European record set by Chelsea. Indeed, the last time Frankfurt lost in the competition was a 1-0 reverse against FC Basel on 6 August 2020 in their round of 16 second leg.
